Name: Clint
Text: Hmm I guess I owe you an apology.

Name: Clarissa
Text: You! Who are you working for?

Name: General Ghani
Text: This was an inside job. Your so-called President was selling you out.

Name: Clarissa
Text: No, Clint, I think he's right.

Name: General Ghani
Text: He probably wanted to expand University Kingdom, but he couldn't keep up with the payments...

Name: General Ghani
Text: So, Banktania sent us in to collect.

Name: General Ghani
Text: And they're not going to like that we're coming back empty handed.

Name: Clint
Text: Hmph. Who says you're going back?

Name: Clarissa
Text: Alright Clint, lets take him and get back to the others.
